question: Show minimalist landscape architects and interior designers.
sql_query1:
SELECT Interior_Designers.Name
FROM Interior_Designers
WHERE Interior_Designers.Style = "Minimalism"
UNION
SELECT Landscape_Architects.Name
FROM Landscape_Architects
WHERE Landscape_Architects.Style = "Minimalism"
sql_query2:
SELECT Interior_Designers.Name
FROM Interior_Designers
UNION
SELECT Landscape_Architects.Name
FROM Landscape_Architects
WHERE Landscape_Architects.Style = "Minimalism"
interpretation1: Which interior designers are minimalists and which landscape architects have the same style?
interpretation2: Show a list of all interior designers and also provide a list of minimalist landscape architects.
